participant_1.name: Haruki
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and supportive, always eager to celebrate the achievements of others. Enjoys engaging conversations about culture and personal interests.
participant_1.background: I started learning Japanese at college. I hope to save enough money for it. Our class is planning a trip to Japan. I am tired of having to read subtitles. I like to watch Japanese cartoons anime in my free time.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and responsible, he takes pride in his accomplishments and is dedicated to building a future for his family. He has a hopeful outlook on life and values relationships.
participant_2.background: I am proposing tonight. I graduated college last week. My girlfriend is 6 months pregnant. I got a job as a coach at a local high school.

content.text: What are you doing tonight?
I'm proposing to my girlfriend!
Congratulations! That's so exciting!
Thank you! We're both so excited.
I'm sure she'll say yes.
I hope so!
So, what made you decide to propose tonight?

Well, we've been dating for a few years now and I know she's the one. I also just graduated college and got a job as a coach at a local high school, so I'm finally in a place where I can support her and a family.
That's great! I'm so happy for you both.
Thank you!
I'm sure you'll have a beautiful wedding.
I hope so!
So, what are your plans for the future?
We're not sure yet, but we're both excited to start our lives together.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thank you!
Well, I should probably get going. I have to work in the morning.
Okay, it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great night!
You too!
